modmenu.summaryTranslation.writer: This mod adds you the ability to write notes in minecraft using the Item Edit plugin
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.writer:
ATTENTION, ALARM, GOOGLE TRANSLATION!!!
It makes it possible to create various notes, which, moreover, in the presence of CIT Resewn / Optifine, have their own textures. Folders for documents of different colors from a bundle - as a gift!
